bio: Software engineer of Digital banking in Thailand
contributionDescription: I have actively contributed to Optimism by sharing educational content, providing valuable feedback, and participating in governance discussions to enhance end-user experience and adoption. These efforts have played a crucial role in supporting the development and growth of the Optimism network, aligning with the goals of RetroPGF 3 to reward impactful contributions.

contributionLinks.description: Medium for share about dapp that focus on optimism eco

Paragraph -Layer3 Quests: The Ultimate Interactive Experience

impactDescription:
1. End-User Experience & Adoption:
I actively engage in improving end-user experience and adoption for Optimism by sharing educational content through tweets and providing valuable feedback to the Optimism team.

2.Collective Governance:
I actively participate in collective governance by initiating and engaging in proposals (OPs), voting on important matters, and actively contributing to discussions in the forum.
